# v-theme



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `name`   | `name`    | The name of the theme to use. The user is responsible for including the associated stylesheet(s). Supportive themes must adhere to theme guidelines by exposing a class that follows the `v-theme-{name}` convention. | `string` | `''`    |
